20110110060915.000|20110110060918.000|CC1|DALLAS ON HER WAY TO ARIZONA.

20110110060928.000|20110110060930.000|CC1|SHOWS CONGRESS AT ITS BEST, TO

20110110060949.000|20110110060952.000|CC1|11, THE BEST PENA'S -- I THINK  
20110110060952.000|20110110060954.000|CC1|PEOPLE GET IT.                  
20110110060954.000|20110110060957.000|CC1|I DO.                           
20110110060957.000|20110110060959.000|CC1|I CERTAINLY AM HOPEFUL THAT IT
